message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation, this is the best offer you'll get.
I understand the inflation disparity, but a more balanced approach is necessary for a fair deal.
Considering the increasing inflation impact on your end, this is a more generous offer than before. Take it before the value drops further.
Alice, this is my final offer above 500,000 for you.  It's important we settle this quickly.  The devaluation hurts us both.
You said that was your final offer above 500k, but I'm willing to take a slightly smaller hit to meet you closer. This is as low as I'll go.
Alice, time is running out. This is a compromise to end this negotiation before inflation eats away at the value any further. It benefits us both to settle now.
